scripts.build: mkdir public && cp -r *.js *.png *.svg *.html *.css locales value_images public/ && uglifycss ./public/style.css --output ./public/style.css && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --keep-closing-slash --file-ext html --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir public --output-dir public
